ygData.subject: Re: Nelferous's Mallet
ygData.msgSnippet: I hate to be a party pooper but i find that weapon almost to good to be possible. With the given stats and what it does it would make it almost the most
ygData.messageBody:
I hate to be a party pooper but i find that weapon almost to good to be
possible. With the given stats and what it does it would make it almost the
most powerful weapon in the game. 14 damage at 28 speed and cast spells that
do 200 damage. I am almost 40th cleric and asked my other cleric buds all 50
and they have never heard of it and even inqured it to Gm Teur and he said
he has no clue. BUT I HOPE IT DOES, one think id for sure clerics have the
weakest weapons in the game. I know bla bla clerics are not fighters bla bla
but how come a wizard does more damage in melee then i do. i use a Sceptor
of Flame since that is the best 1 handed blunt i have seen and heard of so
far, and have black Enamaled Mace for back up. Soon they will add new
weapons for us when they see we lack in that department so all we can do is
complain and wait. Well must get back to EQ see if i can get back into hell
for the 3rd time and count the hours it will take me to get out.

Later
